ComicInfo.Title: Magicman Meets Nemesis!; Where Time Stood Still!; Second Sight
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 19:09:27. [Issue ID 20151]
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
ComicInfo.Penciller: Kurt Schaffenberger,Pete Costanza,Chic Stone,Pete Costanza,Chic Stone
ComicInfo.Inker: Kurt Schaffenberger,Pete Costanza,Chic Stone,Pete Costanza,Chic Stone
ComicInfo.Summary:
Magicman Meets Nemesis!: Ichabod Potter builds a robot double of Magicman and sends it out to commit crimes. Nemesis is called in to defeat Magicman, whom everyone now believes has turned evil.
Where Time Stood Still!: Bill Thompson finds a man and his daughter in a New Mexico valley who were traveling to California during the days of the Gold Rush. He falls in love with the daughter and tries to leave with her but once out of the valley she immediately dies of old age.
Second Sight: Mildred Winslow is a young psychic whose predictions always come true. She has foreseen that she will die on her twenty-first birthday --- and she does.
ComicInfo.Writer: Zev Zimmer,Kurato Osaki,Richard Hughes,Zev Zimmer,Kurato Osaki,Richard Hughes
